channel.title: N64 Roms
channel.description:
Ok, so i got project 64 and then i tried a number of different sites that had roms, but i couldn't get the games i wanted. They're all protected by ESA. If you can find a site that has: 1) Mario Tennis 2) Paper Mario 3) Mario Party 1,2,3 4) Mario Kart 5) Star Fox 64 6) Mario 64
it would be greatly appreciated. If you know any other good games, you can post them here as well.
